item.title: Academic
item.description: The highly flexible website framework for Hugo with an extensible plugin mechanism. Create a beautifully simple site in under 10 minutes ðŸš€ Latest release (function defer() { if (window.jQuery) { jQuery(document).ready(function(){ GetLatestReleaseInfo(); }); } else { setTimeout(function() { defer() }, 50); } })(); function GetLatestReleaseInfo() { $.getJSON('https://api.github.com/repos/gcushen/hugo-academic/tags').done(function (json) { let release = json[0]; // let downloadURL = release.zipball_url; $('#academic-release').text('Latest release ' + release.name); }); }

Biography I hold a BS and MS in Electronics and Telecommunications Engineering from the University of Bologna (UniBO). I spent three months at the University of Massachussets (UMass Amherst) as a research assistant to prepare my master thesis about random number generation and testing advised by W. Burleson and R. Rovatti. Currently I’m doing a PhD in Computer Science at the Singapore University Design and Technology (SUTD), advised by N.

item.title: Teaching
item.description: Fall 2017: TA 50.012 Networks SUTD Undergrad Spring 2017: TA 50.020 Security SUTD Undergrad 2013: External Commissioner Prof for High School Final Exams LAMP stack, SQL, design and implementation of relational DB, MVC, paradigm, HTTP(S) 2013-2015: Private teacher Grad/undergrad: linear algebra, calculus, programming (C, Pascal) High school: math, physics, programming (C++)
